org.middleheaven.mail
Class MailMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.mail.MailMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MailMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

An email message. This class facilitates email creation abstracting all technology dependencies

getSendDate

public java.util.Date getSendDate()
The send date. If not defined return the current date

setSendDate

public void setSendDate(java.util.Date date)
The apparent date the email is sent. This is not the real date when the email is send, is only the date the user wants to appear as the send date.

Parameters:
date - - email sending date
